unnormalised: As per the UGC guidelines released on 10/07/2024, CUET scores are now considered for admission into many central universities like DU and BHU. Students scoring above 90% in CUET have a higher chance. Don't forget to check the specific eligibility criteria for each course on the respective university websites; for example, some B.Com programs might require maths in 10+2. Also, keep an eye on the application deadlines, usually around the 31st of August. Good luck, folks!
normalised: As per the U-G-C guidelines released on tenth july two thousand and twenty four, C-U-E-T scores are now considered for admission into many central universities like D-U and B-H-U. Students scoring above ninety percent in C-U-E-T have a higher chance. Do not forget to check the specific eligibility criteria for each course on the respective university websites; for example, some B dot Com programs might require maths in ten plus two. Also, keep an eye on the application deadlines, usually around the thirty first of august. Good luck, folks!
